welcome_message_body: Welcome to Billings, Montana! Get ready to explore the charming downtown, beautiful outdoor scenery, and vibrant local culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and make lasting memories.

restaurants.name: Fancy Sushi Asian Fusion
restaurants.description: Fancy Sushi Asian Fusion is a sushi restaurant located in Billings.

restaurants.name: Caramel Cookie Waffles Co.
restaurants.description: Caramel Cookie Waffles Co. is a soup spot located in Billings.

restaurants.description: Panda Express is a chinese restaurant located in Billings.

restaurants.name: The Granary
restaurants.description: The Granary is a american restaurant located in Billings.

restaurants.name: Red Robin
restaurants.description: Red Robin is a burger joint located in Billings.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Billings Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
